short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows changing tab volume on per website basis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions allows boosting or lowering tab volume up to 800% on a per website basis. That means a volume configuration is associated with a particular website, is saved that way and will change for two or more tabs displaying the same website.

Unfortunately, due to API limitations, whenever a new tab is open the extension needs a user interaction to activate. That interaction can be in the form of clicking the icon or pressing the shortcut Alt + Shift + S.
